annotations: LOLA M. KING
adpxvn@r.postjobfree.com

Motivated Customer Service Representative with over 30 years of experience in fast-paced, team-based environments. Great team player comfortable thriving in competitive, fast-paced environments. Polished in handling direct customer inquiries, implementing customer service policies and executing financial responsibilities. Bringing top-notch skills in oral and written communication, active listening and analytical problem-solving skills.

Investigated and resolved customer inquiries and complaints quickly.

Answered constant flow of customer calls with minimal wait times.
Recorded all information regarding financial status of customers.
Processed payments and requested refund to be issued.
